ygData.subject: RE: Digest Number 173
ygData.msgSnippet: Diff class guild have diff colors, so as far as enchanters go, Qeynos has blue i think, but the best newbie robe is the gold Erudite robe which has +2 mana
ygData.messageBody:
Diff class guild have diff colors, so as far as enchanters go,
Qeynos has blue i think,

but the best "newbie" robe is the gold Erudite robe which has +2 mana
instead of +1. The gnome may have similar stats, not sure... but I wore my
erudite yellow robe from level 11-29 when I finally went down to Befallen
and got my Gossimer robe.

now if that frog would only spawn with his robe...

heh

-Mael, 44th Enchanter, Veeshan


>What towns have what colored robes?

>Neriak= Dk Red
>Akanon = Gold
>Felwithe = ?Green?

>Don't know the rest and I need to pick one
